title: New Draft Queue
body: Hey riot, disable blind pick normals for a week to get people to play this new draft champ select please, it removes the trolls but people dont want to click 2 extra buttons unless you make them.  Waited 45 mins before i gave up in NA peak hours, and i queued up as support, and fill, the 2 least popular roles.  And why cant i post this on NA boards ? I log into NA on that NA account and it tells me unauthorized to post on NA boards with my NA account wtf ?

replies.body: This new que system was supposed to be introduced on the 17th according to announcements. Now we are 1 day away from Season 6 starting and still don't have it. Curious to see if OCE will even get it before the new ranked season starts.

you can post on NA boards using your OCE account.
also is your NA account at least level 20?
That looks there is going to be alot of trolls
